title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (North Western
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (North Western 

Waters Landing Obligation) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (north western water landing obligation) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation)
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 101 of 2021) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by the 
insertion after “21 August 2020” in the definition of “Commission Regulation” 
of the following: 

“as amended by Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/2063 of 
25 August 2021”. 

1 OJ L 354, 28.12.2013, p. 22 
2 OJ L 133, 29.5.2015, p.1 
3 OJ L 302, 17.11.2017, p. 1 
4 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
5 OJ L 421, 26.11.2021, P.6 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [224] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [224]

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument gives effect to Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2021/2063 of 25 August 2021 amending and correcting Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2020/2015 specifying details of the implementation of the landing 
obligation for certain fisheries in Western Waters for the period 2021-2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [224] 5
